title: Pull request merge from jona-sassenhagen/nilearn:axes_to_plot_surf to nilearn/nilearn:master

text: LGTM.

The tests do not cover the case ax=None, am I right ? If yes, then a test should cover it indeed.
Best,
The we're fine.

I think we're getting close to merge. My only request would be to output the fig to a tempdir.
Thx !
LGTM.
Should I work on more coverage?
`ax=None` is the default, so it should be covered by all the old tests
Ok thanks!
Ahhhh ok :) I'll get to it.
Finally gotten back to this ...
The only errors seem to be coverage problems - should I do something about these missing .03%?
I've improved the coverage by a bit, is the remainder critical?
Ah right, I forgot the tests aren't executed only on Travis WMs ...
Is this ok?
Ok, so *where should I write the tmp file to?* :)
Ah! I see. I added it on my end? I'll remove it.
Thanks, let's see about this one!
Thanks guys!

Sorry for being late.

As issue pointed may be you have forgotten to add ```figure``` also where it would be nice for users also to pass fig=plt.figure():

>We should strive to make the plot_surf function as homogeneous as possible with the other plotting functions, and thus add both an "axes" and a "figure" argument, with the same semantics.

Failures were recently fixed in master. Can you please rebase ?
Thanks

>The only errors seem to be coverage problems - should I do something about these missing .03%?

If you can, yes please. That would be useful to maintain some code coverage.
